        public static String[] split(String original,

        Split string into multiple strings.
        参数:
        original - Original string
        separator - Separator string in original string
        返回:
        Splitted string array

        参数:
        s - the s
        f - the f
        r - the r
        返回:

      • removeHtml

        public static String removeHtml(String text)
        Method removes HTML tags from given string.
        参数:
        text - Input parameter containing HTML tags (eg. cat)
        返回:
        String without HTML tags (eg. cat)

      • encode

        public static String encode(byte[] data)
        Base64 encode the given data.
        参数:
        data - the data
        返回:
        the string

      • decode

        public static byte[] decode(String s)
        Decodes the given Base64 encoded String to a new byte array. The byte array holding the decoded data is returned.
        参数:
        s - the s
        返回:
        the byte[]
